title: FS: T206 Red Kleinow BOSTON VAR SGC 40 w/ Polar Bear $150

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Red Kleinow BOSTON VAR SGC 40 w/ Polar Bear $150
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Red Kleinow Boston Variation Catching.  This card is graded SGC 40 (PSA 3).  Card is very nicely centered, and features the tougher Polar Bear back.  Back is clean and unstained.  Very nice eye appeal 3!

$SOLD!.  Email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url]
